article: taiwan 's united microelectronics corp. , the world 's second-biggest producer of made-to-order computer chips , has purchased ##.## million shares in taiwanese chipset maker silicon integrated systems corp. , umc said on monday .
abstract: taiwanese chip giant umc buys shares in chipset maker sis
